dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I'd suggest focusing on maintaining a low profile and avoiding any suspicious behavior or discussions that could arouse suspicion. Since Alice is known to be the detective, it would be wise to keep our conversations casual and unrelated to the game.
